discussion_comments.commented_code:

discussion_comments.comment_body:
There is a problem with our version of Prettier in that it doesn't know how to parse our .d.ts files correctly 😢 
So I needed to ignore these - and since they are only for the playground I thought it would be fine until we update Prettier across the monorepo

Is this necessary that this directory exists? 😮 

Given the `recreateDiffsFolder` logic I'd say no?

if that's the case I'd be really inclined on not having this, it is very minor but I'd really avoid having extra unnecessary directories as that generates clutter and potential confusion

(PS: also, does it need to be under `packages`? 🤔)
